amendment.description: To preserve the point of order against reconciliation legislation that would increase the deficit or reduce a surplus.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 436 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 436 proposed by Senator Baldwin. (consideration: CR S1878; text: CR S1878) To preserve the point of order against reconciliation legislation that would increase the deficit or reduce a surplus.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 436 proposed by Senator Baldwin.
